meanings.definition: The quality or state of being frisky.
meanings.sent1: Her friskinesses brought joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's friskinesses were evident as it ran around the yard.
meanings.sent3: The friskinesses of the kitten made the room feel alive.
meanings.sent4: The friskinesses of the wind made the trees dance in delight.
meanings.sent5: The friskinesses of the children playing in the park was contagious.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of someone who is lively and playful.
meanings.sent1: The friskinesses of the squirrel entertained the onlookers.
meanings.sent2: His friskinesses always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent3: The friskinesses of the otters playing in the water was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The friskinesses of the waves crashing against the shore seemed almost mischievous.
meanings.sent5: The friskinesses of the children at the playground filled the air with laughter.
